subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: Charl Schwartzel and Rory McIlroy completed their U.S. Open practice rounds about 20 minutes apart — Schwartzel first, then McIlroy, much like their Masters finish in April.
snippet: Charl Schwartzel and Rory McIlroy completed their U.S. Open practice rounds about 20 minutes apart — Schwartzel first, then McIlroy, much like their Masters finish in April.
